MemberSignature.Value: public bool TryRemove (System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<System.Windows.TextDecoration> textDecorations, out System.Windows.TextDecorationCollection result);

.method public hidebysig instance bool TryRemove(class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<class System.Windows.TextDecoration> textDecorations, class System.Windows.TextDecorationCollection result) cil managed

Docs.param: Out parameter containing the result. If no element was removed from the current collection, then is a new collection identical to the original one.
Docs.summary: Removes a collection of from the current collection and returns the resultant (new) collection.
Docs.returns: if at least one item was removed from the current collection, otherwise

remarks.format: ## Remarks The current collection remains unchanged. If the collection to be removed is not a subset of the current collection, then no element is removed. If the source collection has multiple instances of an item, then all instances of the item are removed.
